title: "A carved wooden ""In Memoriam"" plaque commemorating ""Lt. G.C. Kerr. Killed in Action. Singapore. Feb 10th 1942"" and 1 postcard" Memoriam plaque commemorating Lt. G.C. Kerr.

  physical_appearance: This is a wooden carved memoriam plaque. It is rectangular in shape. The front features a rising sun design
 with a cross in the middle. There is a carved inscription on a banner at the top
 an \u0027RIP\u0027 on the cross
 and the name and date at the bottom. The plaque is brown in colour.

  sgcool_label_text: \A carved wooden \\In Memoriam\\ plaque commemorating Lt. G.C. Kerr who was killed in action in Singapore on Feb 10th 1942. It would have possibly been assembled during internment and speaks to P.O.W efforts to remember their fallen comrades. This artefact is part of the archive of James Steele

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a wooden carved memoriam plaque. It is rectangular in shape. The front features a rising sun design, with a cross in the middle. There is a carved inscription on a banner at the top, an 'RIP' on the cross, and the name and date at the bottom. The plaque is brown in colour.
